forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
